# Helvety Store

> Official Helvety Store. Software and subscriptions engineered and designed in Switzerland.

## Core Pages
- [Home](https://store.helvety.com): Browse the Helvety product catalog
- [Products](https://store.helvety.com/products): Full listing of all available software products and subscriptions
- [SPO Explorer](https://store.helvety.com/products/helvety-spo-explorer): SharePoint Online Explorer product page

## Helvety Ecosystem
- [Helvety](https://helvety.com): Main Helvety website with company information and legal pages
- [Helvety PDF](https://pdf.helvety.com): Free, privacy-focused PDF toolkit
- [Helvety Auth](https://auth.helvety.com): Centralized authentication for all Helvety apps
- [Helvety Contacts](https://contacts.helvety.com): End-to-end encrypted contact management
- [Helvety Tasks](https://tasks.helvety.com): End-to-end encrypted task management

## Optional
- [GitHub](https://github.com/CasparRubin/helvety): Public monorepo for all Helvety applications (source-visible, not open source)
